newsitem.title: USA: Papa John's acquires Dallas franchisee.
newsitem.headline: Papa John's acquires Dallas franchisee.

text.p: Papa John's International Inc said Monday it has acquired Nortex Pizza L.P., a franchisee that operates 18 of its restaurants in Dallas.
Terms of the transaction, which is to be accounted for as a pooling of interests, were not disclosed.
The company said that although several of the restaurants have been operating for less than three months, it does not expect it to be dilutive to earnings.
The franchisee's principal operating partner, Sam Pyeatt, will continue to oversee operations in the market as a district manager for Papa John's, it said.
